text:
Question 94) In this graph, performed by a group that makes artistic interventions in the city of Lima, there is a word game with the verb “Poner”. In the first occurrence, the verb is equivalent to “wearing an outfit”, already in the second, indicates
A) Start of action.
B) State change.
C) Conclusion of the idea.
D) simultaneity of facts.
E) continuity of process.
